text: Can you help me modify a reminder for tomorrow?
Sorry, I am unable to understand the specific date you want me to set the reminder. Could you please tell me the exact date and time?
Yes, I need to modify a reminder for March 17th at 2 PM to call my mom.
Sure, let me search for relevant tools first.

output.name: GetUserToken
output.desc_for_search: get user tokenGet the user token.

output.name: ModifyReminder
output.description: Modify a reminder API that takes three parameters - 'token'，'content' and 'time'. The 'token' parameter refers to the user's token and the 'content' parameter refers to the description of the reminder and the 'time' parameter specifies the time at which the reminder should be triggered.

text: Okay, to modify the reminder, I will need your token. Can you please provide me with your username and password?
My username is JohnDoe and my password is pass123.
I have received your token. Now, please provide me with the content of the reminder and the time you want it to be triggered.
The content is "Call mom" and the time is March 17th, 2023 at 2:30 PM.
The reminder for calling your mom has been modified successfully. Can I help you with anything else?
